org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.sink

类 WriteFormat<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.sink.WriteFormat<IN>
  • 类型参数:
    IN - Input tuple type
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    WriteFormatAsCsv, WriteFormatAsText

    @PublicEvolving
public abstract class WriteFormat<IN>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class for formatting the output of the writeAsText and writeAsCsv functions.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • write

        protected abstract void write(java.lang.String path,
                              java.util.ArrayList<IN> tupleList)
        Writes the contents of tupleList to the file specified by path.
        参数:
        path - is the path to the location where the tuples are written
        tupleList - is the list of tuples to be written
